definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be or grow firm, strong, strengthen (NH id.; Aram. h.zaq [[חֲזַק]] bind on or about, gird on, cf. Ar. h.azaqa bind, squeeze)—†

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: of physical strength of hands Ju Jdg 7:11, 2Sa 2:7, 2Sa 16:21, Ez Eze 22:14, Zec 8:9, Zec 8:13 (on Ez Eze 3:14 v. infr.); of arm, sq. inf. Ez Eze 30:21; used of recovery fr. illness Is 39:1; sq. [[מִן]] compar. over power 1Sa 17:50 (c. [[בְּ]] instr.), 2Sa 13:14.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of people, army De 11:8, Jos 17:13 (JE), = Ju Jdg 1:28, Ezr 9:12; sq. [[מִן]] compar. be stronger than, too strong for, prevail against 2Sa 10:11, 2Sa 10:11 = 1Ch 19:12, 1Ch 19:12, 1Ki 20:23, 1Ki 20:25; id., sq. acc. 1Ki 16:22, cf. of ´[[י]] as prevailing over man Je 20:7 (‖[[יׇכׂל]]); sq. [[על]] 2Ch 8:3, 2Ch 27:5.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of royal power [[וְדָוִד הׂלֵךְ וְהָוֵק]] 2Sa 3:1 (opp. [[הׂלְכִים וְדַלִּים]]); cf. 2Ch 26:15 (‖[[חֶוְקָה]] v:2Ch 26:16), Da 11:5.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: prevail over, upon, of word of king 2Sa 24:4 (sq. [[אֶל־]]) = 1Ch 21:4 (sq. [[עַל]]).

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: of bonds Is 28:22.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: of sound of trumpet [[הוֹלֵךְ וְהָוֵק מְאׂד]] Ex 19:19 (E, cf. [[חָזׇק]] v:Ex 19:16) it grew much louder and louder.
be firm, fast:—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: lit. be caught fast, of Absalom's head 2Sa 18:9 (sq. [[בְּ]]).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: be firm, secure, of a kingdom 2Ki 14:5 ( + [[בְּיׇדוֹ]]) = 2Ch 25:3 ( + [[עָלָיו]]). Oftener

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: hold firmly to, devote oneself to, sq. [[בְּ]] 2Ch 31:4.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: sq. Inf. be firm not to eat blood, i.e. firmly refrain from it De 12:23, cf. 1Ch 28:7.
press, be urgent, sq. [[עַל]] + Inf. Ex 12:33 (E); sq. [[עַל]] of hand of ´[[י]] in prophetic ecstasy Ez Eze 3:14 (LXX Co rd. [[חֲזׇקָה]], adj., v. [[חָזׇק]]).
in bad sense:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: grow stout, rigid, hard, with idea of perversity, of Pharaoh's heart Ex 7:13, Ex 7:22, Ex 8:15 (all P), Ex 9:35 (R); cf. [[חזקו עָלַי דבריכם]] Mal 3:13.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: be severe, grievous, of battle 2Ki 3:26; of famine Ge 41:56, Ge 41:57 (E), Ge 47:20 (J; sq. [[על]]), 2Ki 25:3 = Je 52:6.

definitions.title: II.
definitions.body: transit. only [[לאׁ חֲזֶקוֹ]] 2Ch 28:20 strengthened him not, but txt. very dub. (‖[[וַיָחַר לוֹ]]). †
make strong (physically):

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: sq. acc. pers. Ju Jdg 16:28; sq. [[על]] Jdg 3:12; sq. [[מָתְנַיִם]] Na 2:2 (‖[[אַמֵּץ כּׂחַ]]; of personif. people).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: = restore to strength Da 10:18, Da 10:19; to health Ez Eze 34:4, Eze 34:16; c. [[לְ]] give strength to 1Ch 29:12; so, sq. [[זְרוֹעׂתָם]], Ho 7:15, Ez Eze 30:24 (and v:Eze 30:25 Co, v.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: sq. acc. rei Is 41:7, Je 10:4 (both c. [[בְּ]] instr.; of manufacture of idols); of strengthening tent-pegs, in metaph. Is 54:4, cf. Is 33:23; sq. bars of gates Ps 147:13; oft. of making strong, fortifying a town, etc. Na 3:14, 2Ch 11:11, 2Ch 11:12, 2Ch 26:9, 2Ch 32:5; = repair (wall, obj. not expr.) Ne 3:19 v. Hiph.; c. acc. of temple 2Ki 12:6, 2Ki 12:7, 2Ki 12:15, 2Ki 22:6, 2Ch 24:5, 2Ch 24:12, 2Ch 29:3, 2Ch 34:8, cf. v:2Ch 34:10 (‖[[לִבְדּוֹק]]); sq. ´[[לְבית י]] 1Ch 26:27; obj. breaches (acc.) 2Ki 12:8, 2Ki 12:9, 2Ki 12:13, 2Ki 22:5.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: of establishing kingdom 2Ch 11:17.

strengthen the hands (acc.) of any one, i.e. sustain, encourage (opp. [[רִפָּה]]) Ju Jdg 9:24, Je 23:14, Ez Eze 13:22, Is 35:3, Job 4:3, Ezr 6:22, Ne 2:18, Ne 6:9, 2Ch 29:34; [[ידו בֵּאלהים]] ´[[וַיְח]] 1Sa 23:16; sq. [[בְּ]] Ezr 1:6 ( + [[בְּ]] instr.)
make strong = bold, encourage, c. acc. De 1:38, De 3:28, 2Sa 11:5, Is 41:7; c. acc. pers. + ´[[לַעֲבׂדֵת בֵּית י]] 2Ch 35:2.
make firm:—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: c. 2 acc. [[וְאַבְנֵטְֽךָ אֲחַוְּקֶנּוּ]] Is 22:21 and with thy sash (of office) will I make him firm, i.e. bind it firmly about him (‖[[הלבישׁ]]).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: make firm or fixed, = definitely adopt [[־]]´[[יהּ]] [[לָמוֹ דָּבָר רָע]] Ps 64:6.

make rigid, hard, i.e. perverse, obstinate, harden (the heart of any one) Ex 4:21, Ex 10:20, Ex 10:27 (all E), Ex 9:12, Ex 11:10, Ex 14:4, Ex 14:8, Ex 14:17 (all P), Jos 11:20 (D); v. also [[פניהם מִסֶּלַע]] ´[[ת]] Je 5:3 †.

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: make strong, strengthen Je 51:12.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: make firm, the kingdom 2Ki 15:19 ( + [[בְּיׇדוֹ]]).
make severe, of battle 2Sa 11:25. †
sq. [[יד]] = support Ez Eze 16:49; sq. [[זְרוֹעוֹת]] Eze 30:25 (subj. ´[[י]]; but Co rds.
= repair, walls of Jerus., Ne 3:4, Ne 3:4, Ne 3:4 + 31 t. Ne: 3; cf. (in gen.) pt. used substant. [[מחזיקי בדקף]] Ez Eze 27:9, Eze 27:27 of Tyre and her ships (‖[[מַלָּחִים]], etc.) †
prevail, abs. Da 11:7; sq. [[עַל]] Job 18:9; prevail upon to [[בּוֹ לֶאֱכׂל]] ´[[הח]] 2Ki 4:8.
esp. take or keep hold of, seize, grasp:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: take hold of, seize, catch, sq. [[בְּ]] Ge 19:4(J), Ge 21:18(E), Ex 4:4 (J; ‖[[אחז]]), Ju Jdg 7:20, 1Sa 15:27, 2Sa 1:11, 1Ki 1:50, 1Ki 2:28, 2Ki 2:12, 2Ki 4:27, Is 4:1, Zec 8:23, Zec 8:23, Pr 7:13, Pr 26:17, cf. also Ju Jdg 19:25, Jdg 19:29, 2Ch 28:15; with violence De 22:25, De 25:11, 1Sa 17:35 (perh. of consec. freq., v. Dr), 2Sa 2:16, 2Sa 13:11; sq. [[לְ]] 2Sa 15:5; fig. take hold in order to lead one (subj. ´[[י]]) sq. [[בְּ]] Je 31:32, c acc. Is 41:9, Is 41:13; cf. Is 51:18 ([[בְּ]]; ‖[[נֵהֵל]]); sq. acc. Na 3:14 take hold of the brick-mould, Je 6:23 = Je 50:42, Zec 14:13 (with violence), Ps 35:2, Ne 4:10, Ne 4:11, seize the kingdom Da 11:21; in metaph. Mic 4:9 ([[הֶחֱזִיקֵךְ חִיל]]), Je 6:24, Je 8:21, Je 49:24 (v.Gie), Je 50:43; of pious laying hold of ´[[י]], sq. [[בְּ]] Is 64:6; cf. Is 27:5, Is 56:2, Is 56:4, Is 56:6; of other gods 1Ki 9:9 = 2Ch 7:22; laying hold of wisdom Pr 3:18, cf. Pr 4:13, Job 2:3, Job 2:9, Job 27:6, Je 8:5.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: have or keep hold of, sq. [[בְּ]] Ju Jdg 16:26, 2Sa 3:29, Je 50:33, Ne 4:15.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: hold up, sq. [[בְּ]], fig. = sustain, support Lv Le 25:35; of ´[[י]] holding his servants Is 42:6, Is 45:1, cf. Job 8:20; v. also pt. used substantively Da 11:1 (‖[[מָעוֹז]]), v:Da 11:6 (‖[[מֵבִיא]], [[יׁלֵד]]); of Ne. holding fast to his ([[בְּ]]) his work Ne 5:16; cf. of wicked, holding to his house Job 8:15; cleave or cling to  ([[על]]) one's brethren Ne 10:30. hence

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: keep, retain, sq. [[בְּ]] Ex 9:2 (J), Ju Jdg 7:8, Jdg 19:4; so Ez Eze 7:13 Sm Co (MT Hithp.); sq. anger (acc.) Mic 7:18.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: hence also hold, contain, sq. acc. 2Ch 4:5. †

strengthen oneself 2Sa 3:6, 1Ki 20:22, 2Ch 1:1, 2Ch 12:13, 2Ch 13:21, 2Ch 21:4, 2Ch 23:1, 2Ch 25:11, 2Ch 27:6; sq. [[עַל]] against 2Ch 17:1; gain strength Ezr 7:28, Da 10:19, cf. [[ביהוה]] ´[[הִתְח]] 1Sa 30:6; fig.= take courage 2Ch 15:8.
put forth strength, use one's strength Ge 48:2 (i.e. he exerted himself, he sat up by a great effort), Nu 13:20, Ju Jdg 20:22, 1Sa 4:9, 2Sa 10:12, 1Ch 19:13, 2Ch 32:5.
sq. [[לִפְנֵי]] withstand 2Ch 13:7, 2Ch 13:8.
sq. [[עִם]] hold strongly with 1Ch 11:10, Da 10:21, cf. of ´[[י]], [[עִם לְבָבָם שָׁלֵם אֵלָיו]] ´[[להתח]] 2Ch 16:9.—For [[יִתְחַזׇּ֑קו]] Ez Eze 7:13 rd. Hiph., v. Sm Co Da.
